title: New Chinese GPU Maker Moore Threads Unveils the MTT S60 GPU
description: Moore Threads is a new Chinese GPU maker (founded in 2020). This new brand has unveiled two days ago the MTT S60, its first desktop graphics card. This graphics card supports all 3D APIs available on PC: Direct3D (12?), Vulkan and OpenGL (4.6?), including OpenGL ES. The GPU is built with a 12nm manufacturing process and is based on the MUSA architecture (Moore Threads … Continue reading New Chinese GPU maker Moore Threads Unveils the MTT S60 Graphics Card With Vulkan, OpenGL and Direct3D Support »
